activities: Zerista provides hosted sites for conferences, events and tradeshows.  As part of our business, we receive different types of data from show organizers, including attendee, session, exhibitor and mapping data.  Additional data is also generated through the use of our sites by organizers, attendees, speakers and exhibitors.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Registration information, such as name, e-mail address, postal address, phone number and country of residence.  Attendees may choose to provide optional profile information such as a real name, photo, company/organization affiliation, profile description, tags and location.
recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should be directed to Zerista. Zerista will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information by reference to the principles contained in our Privacy Policy. In the event of a dispute, PrivacyTrust will act as a third party arbitrator.
